summary: Edits the names of call ODAHVIING and DURNEHVIIR shouts. Because of reasons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img.4plebs.org/boards/tg/image/1367/57/1367571691726.png[/img]

Edits the names of the ODAHVIING and DURNEHVIIR shouts.

Call Dragon >=> Call Odahviing
Summon Durnehviir >=> Call Durnehviir

Should be incompatible with anything that changes the main names of these shouts
(so anything that changes names of individual words works fine (e.g. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30457]Dragon Language Shouts[/url] partially)).

Requires Dawnguard.
[/center]
author: Halendia
